ComicInfo.Summary:
This is the second R.A. Salvatore Series in the DemonWars saga set in the land of Corona, and featuring the Ranger Andacanavar. Andacanavar the Ranger has uncovered a plot by the giants of the north to wipe mankind from the face of Corona, the setting of R. A. Salvatore's epic DemonWars fantasy series. This all-new graphic novel pits Andacanavar, heroic Abellican nun Moira and the devious Red Cap Dwarf Grave Mungo against the magic-wielding Northern Giants and their terrifying demonic masters.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-14 18:32:55. [CVDB133960]
